summary: Dinesh Karthik is an international cricketer from India.

value.label: Krishna Kumar Dinesh Karthik
Tiruchendur, Tamil Nadu, India
Indian
Wicket-keeper batsman
Dinesh Karthik is a wicket-keeper mostly in Test matches, and right-handed batsman.

image.altText: Style of play for Dinesh Karthik

value.label: Karthik made his debut at the first-class level in late-2002 against Baroda
The Ranji Trophy is a domestic first-class cricket championship played in India between teams representing regional and state cricket associations.

value.label: Karthik made his international debut in an One day international match against England in 2004
The England cricket team represents England and Wales in international cricket. England and Australia were the first teams to play a Test match in 1877.
Karthik played the earlier matches but was dropped later in the tournament

The 2007 Cricket World Cup (officially known as ICC Cricket World Cup 2007) was the 9th edition of the Cricket World Cup tournament that took place in the West Indies from 13 March to 28 April 2007, using the sport's One Day International (ODI) format.
Karthik scored an unbeaten 51 in India's group match against the West Indies

The ICC Champions Trophy was a one day international (ODI) cricket tournament organised by the International Cricket Council (ICC), second in importance only to the Cricket World Cup. Its name was changed to the Champions Trophy in 2002.
Karthik played in the 2008 Indian Premier League as the wicket-keeper for the Delhi Daredevils
The Delhi Capitals are a franchise cricket team that represents the city of Delhi in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
Karthik scored and unbeaten 29 runs off 8 balls in a T20 match against Bangladesh

image.altText: Karthik scored and unbeaten 29 runs off 8 balls in a T20 match against Bangladesh

value.label: In the 2002-2003 season while playing for U-19 Tamil Nadu team, Karthik scored, 227 against Goa

image.altText: In the 2002-2003 season while playing for U-19 Tamil Nadu team, Karthik scored, 227 against Goa

value.label: In 2017, Karthik faced 18 deliveries without scoring a single run and set a new record for an Indian player for the highest number of balls faced with scoring a run in a ODI.

image.altText: In 2017, Karthik faced 18 deliveries without scoring a single run and set a new record for an Indian player for the highest number of balls faced with scoring a run in a ODI.

value.label: The India national cricket team is also known as Team India and Men in Blue. India is ranked first in Tests, second in ODIs and second in T20Is by the ICC. Virat Kohli is the current captain of the team, while the head coach is Ravi Shastri.

image.altText: Picture of India national cricket team

value.label: The Kolkata Knight Riders (also known by the acronym KKR) are a franchise cricket team representing the city of Kolkata in the Indian Premier League.
Tamil Nadu Cricket Team is a domestic cricket team representing the state of Tamil Nadu, India
